name: The House on the Hill (erikengineengineer)
description:
Try to get into the Basement and find out what happened!

This is a halloween-project made by my community and me mostly on my Twitch stream.

Checkout the VODs
twitch.tv/erikengineengineer

Are you interested in Game Jams and Game development in Unreal Engine? Checkout my YouTube, leave some likes and subscribe!
tinyurl.com/swa3cbkv

This Game is mostly made of Epics free marketplace assets. It's about 15 Minutes of playtime.

I played this game on my test potato (GTX660 graphics) and it was OK. So I think a 1050 or equivalent should do the job also.
